name: scan-page-validator
description: Playwright test to validate scan page historical data display

scripts.test:headless: node -e "const validator = require('./validate-scan-page-historical-data.js'); const v = new validator(); v.browser = null; v.initialize = async () => { const { chromium } = require('playwright'); v.browser = await chromium.launch({headless: true}); v.page = await v.browser.newPage(); await v.page.setViewportSize({ width: 1920, height: 1080 }); return true; }; v.runCompleteTest().then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(() => process.exit(1));"

author: CE-Hub Testing Suite
